title: How do i get Riot girl tristana and unchained alistar?
body: Just wondering, i remember there was a get these skins for free even thing but i never bothered to do it, is it still available?

replies.body: Riot Girl Tristana can be obtained from Facebook and Unchained Alistar through Youtube.  If you have any issues receiving them, you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We're happy to help you out individually!
